Locally-active Data Summation Operations

These classes provide basic operations for summing data across patches at shared grid points. They apply when each simulation data item is defined on a unique set of patches on each patch level; i.e., the data is "locally-active".

  • SAMRAI::algs::LocallyActiveDataPatchBoundaryNodeSum
  • SAMRAI::algs::LocallyActiveDataPatchBoundaryEdgeSum
  • SAMRAI::algs::LocallyActiveDataOuternodeSumTransactionFactory
  • SAMRAI::algs::LocallyActiveDataOuteredgeSumTransactionFactory
